name: The Paper Mario Christmas Special
storyline: Parakarry has lost the presents for various residents of Toad Town! Mario and Parakarry set off to retrieve the presents, and, hopefully, save Christmas.
summary: Paper Mario Christmas Special is a ROM Hack of Paper Mario. It was developed by Rain, Alex, Fish, Fewffwa, and Den of the Paper Mario Modding Discord.
